rooms.description: A welcoming foyer with a north-facing entrance ensuring positive energy flow as per Vastu. It features Bohemian decor elements.
The main open space serves as a living room, dining area, and work zone, designed with bohemian chic style. The layout is flexible to accommodate creative furniture and decor.
An open kitchen integrated with the living area, featuring modern yet rustic Bohemian elements, ensuring adherence to local building norms and Vastu principles for food preparation.
Compact yet functional bathroom positioned optimally to maintain flow in the apartment layout while respecting privacy.

openings.description: Ensures entry of positive energy according to Vastu guidelines.
Large windows for natural light and ventilation while maintaining bohemian aesthetics.
Spacious balcony attached to the bedroom for leisure and enhanced natural light.
